subject: [cc-devel] System License Tracking
body:
Hi all,
I'm a new tech intern here at Creative Commons and would like your 
feedback on my initial design of a system-wide license system.  This 
will include creating a library to allow developers to access the 
licenses on a particular system.  After this is created I'll create 
front-ends to this system through various systems starting with gnome.  
The biggest issue I'd like feedback on is what a license file should 
look like.  I'd like to store the uri, name, description, status and 
legal text within each license file.  I've post more info about this 
project on the Creative Commons TechBlog at 
http://techblog.creativecommons.org/2007/06/19/system-integrated-licensing/ 
.
Thanks,
Scott
